interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: TOUCH IN SOL Flawless Skin Top Coat 1.18 fl.oz. (35ml) - One Step Makeup (Nourishing Ampoule + High Adhesive Makeup Base + Fresh Silky Powder), Moisturizing High Coverage Foundation (#1 Light) Review Date: 2019/04/08 Store: Touch in Sol Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Touch in Sol', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Flawless Skin', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: My friend recommended this Touch in Sol Flawless skin top coat, and I am so glad she did.
It is really more of a foundation, it has perfect medium coverage. It feels amazing on my skin, light and silky smooth. It leaves me looking matte, but not dry. It's surprisingly radiant.
I use it over the Touch in Sol primer, without setting powder, and it easily lasts the whole day.
So, here I am recommending it to you! Try it! It's amazing! Review Title: Flawless Foundation Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
30 PCS Blue Hair Care Rollers Hair Curlers Silicone No Clip Hair Style Rollers Soft Magic DIY Curling Hairstyle Tools Hair Accessories ONEONEY {'Item Form': 'Clip', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'ONEONEY', 'Unit Count': '30.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.31 x 2.68 inches; 8.57 Ounces'} These are an inexpensive and fairly comfortable way to roll my hair at night. It makes getting up and being ready to go in the morning much faster, since all I have to do is unroll, give a spray and shake - and bam waves for days.
However, the quality is decent but not great, one of the rollers looked like it was left out side and got chewed on. But, 1 out of 30 (I counted them) is still good odds for the price.
They came in the matching clear blue zipper bag, and are easy to store. I'd happily purchase another set. Comfy curls AG Care Natural Remedy Apple Cider Vinegar Leave On Mist {'Brand': 'AG Care', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair.Gently cleanses and seals cuticle to enhance shine. Superfoods and apple cider vinegar support soft, healthy hair. See more', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 6 inches; 6.14 Ounces', 'Item model number': '100150', 'UPC': '625336002391', 'Manufacturer': 'AG Hair', 'Country of Origin': 'Canada'} This leave in hair remedy from AG smells wonderful, like a sweet and spicy scent. While it applies strong, it dissipated and left behind a soft clean spicy smell.
It worked really well, and was best when I used it after a work out on damp hair vs dry or showered.
It’s a nice product in my easy care hair Arsenal, I will be picking it up again for my gym bag for sure! Soft hair, smells great! The Sunset Dusk Palette | 15 Color Eye Shadow of BEAUTY GLAZED Eyeshadow Palette | QyeeCosmetics. - Amazon Vine Qyee Cosmetics {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.1 x 0.6 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '725714076539'} This is actually a decent palette of eyeshadows. They are not super pigmented, but very easy to work with. This is a very nice beginner palette, especially for the under 10 price.
That said, these need a primer. They last an okay amount of time, but will fade quickly if you don’t use a primer.
Simple cardboard container, very similar to colourpop and bh, but doesn’t have a mirror. Still it’s sturdy and all the pans arrived unbroken!
The shades are arranged nicely, it really has a visual appeal, and makes choosing an eye look easier.
It’s realky not bad, and while my tastes typically run towards the more luxury and pigmented, this is a good entry for a beginner or lighter makeup user.
I will be looking into other palettes by this brand. High 3 stars TOUCH IN SOL Flawless Skin Top Coat 1.18 fl.oz. (35ml) - One Step Makeup (Nourishing Ampoule + High Adhesive Makeup Base + Fresh Silky Powder), Moisturizing High Coverage Foundation (#1 Light) Touch in Sol {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Touch in Sol', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Flawless Skin', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} My friend recommended this Touch in Sol Flawless skin top coat, and I am so glad she did.
It is really more of a foundation, it has perfect medium coverage. It feels amazing on my skin, light and silky smooth. It leaves me looking matte, but not dry. It's surprisingly radiant.
I use it over the Touch in Sol primer, without setting powder, and it easily lasts the whole day.
So, here I am recommending it to you! Try it! It's amazing! Flawless Foundation
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care & Styling**: The user continues to prioritize hair styling tools and DIY techniques, favoring soft rollers for overnight use due to their convenience. Their use of leave-in treatments enhances both texture and fragrance in their hair care routine.

- **Makeup Interests**: Recently, the user has expanded their makeup exploration, now focusing on foundations alongside eyeshadows. They seek budget-friendly and easy-to-use products that provide effective, medium coverage. Their growing interest indicates a desire for radiant, natural-looking makeup that enhances their overall appearance without complexity.

- **Value for Money**: The user emphasizes affordability and quality in their purchases, willing to overlook minor imperfections if the overall value is worthwhile. This has been consistent in their product reviews across various categories.

- **Ease of Use**: Simplifying their beauty routine remains a priority. They look for solutions that can be effortlessly integrated into their daily regimen, enhancing their beauty arsenal with minimal fuss.

- **Storage & Organization**: Their preference for easy storage solutions underscores an organized approach to beauty tools and products.

- **Quality Considerations**: The user expects reasonable quality and functionality from products, valuing those that fit their lifestyle while providing satisfying experiences.

Overall, the user maintains a practical approach to beauty, integrating functional, comfortable, and affordable solutions for hair care and makeup into their daily life, now with a notable interest in effective foundations that complement their routine.
